price: dhe herën e pestë të kërkojë mallkimin e Allahut ndaj vetes, nëse ka gënjyer.
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةُ أَنَّ لَعۡنَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wal-khāmisatu anna laʿnata al-lahi ʿalayhi in kāna mina al-kādhibīna
